points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.status: Generated through the annotate view
points.quoteText: TunnelBear stores the following information:

points.title: TunnelBear provides information about how they collect personal data
points.status: TunnelBear defines "personal data" as "any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ("Individual") and includes information provided by you while using our Services". They also consider personal data combined with non-personal data to be personal data. They provide information on how they collect "account user data", "operational data",  and "personal and financial data collected at payment".  However, they do not explicitly state how they collect "cookies and persistent trackers".

points.title: TunnelBear provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.status:
TunnelBear defines "personal data" as "any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ("Individual") and includes information provided by you while using our Services". They also consider personal data combined with non-personal data to be personal data.

They provide information on "account user data", "operational data", "personal and financial data collected at payment", and "cookies and persistent trackers". They also explicitly state what information they do not collect.
points.quoteText: As described below, "Personal Data"

points.title: Your personal data is given to third parties
points.status: TunnelBear may send data to third parties for "customer support; email; hosting, protecting, and securing the TunnelBear infrastructure; DDoS prevention; payment processing; as well as understanding website analytics, account and payment related service usage".
points.quoteText:
We may send data to third-party service providers who operate services that help us with: customer support.
email.
hosting, protecting, and securing the TunnelBear infrastructure.
DDoS prevention.
payment processing.
as well as understanding website analytics, account and payment related service usage.

points.title: TunnelBear's third-parties that store cookies store data for the minimum time possible
points.status: Regarding third-party services with the ability to store cookies, the privacy policy states that "[t]hese services store data for as short a time as possible.".
points.quoteText: These services store data for as short a time as possible.

points.title: TunnelBear does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of TunnelBear
points.status: The terms of service states: "You hereby expressly and irrevocably release and forever discharge TunnelBear, its affiliated and associated companies, and their respective directors, officers, employees, agents, representatives, independent and dependent contractors, licensees, successors and assigns of and from any and all actions, causes of action, suits, proceedings, liability, debts, judgments, claims and demands whatsoever in law or equity which you ever had, now have, or hereafter can, shall or may have, for or by reason of, or arising directly or indirectly out of your use of the Services. You hereby agree to indemnify and hold harmless TunnelBear, its affiliated and associated companies, and their respective directors, officers, employees, agents, representatives, independent and dependent contractors, licensees, successors and assigns from and against all claims, losses, expenses, damages and costs (including, but not limited to, direct, incidental, consequential, exemplary and indirect damages), and reasonable attorneys’ fees, resulting from or arising out of (i) a breach of this Agreement, (ii) the use of the Services, by You or any person using your account, or (iii) any violation of any rights of a third party."
points.quoteText: You hereby expressly and irrevocably release and forever discharge TunnelBear, its affiliated and associated companies, and their respective directors, officers, employees, agents, representatives, independent and dependent contractors, licensees, successors and assigns of and from any and all actions, causes of action, suits, proceedings, liability, debts, judgments, claims and demands whatsoever in law or equity which you ever had, now have, or hereafter can, shall or may have, for or by reason of, or arising directly or indirectly out of your use of the Services.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
points.status: Generated through the annotate view
points.quoteText: What do we use it for?

points.title: TunnelBear provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website
points.status: The privacy policy has a complete table of all the cookies set, including by third-parties. It has the names, what service it is for, when it expires, and what it is used for.
points.quoteText: Cookie Details Cookie name Service Cookie Expiry Why do we store it?

points.title: Any liability on behalf of TunnelBear is only limited to the fees you paid as a user in the twelve months prior to the claim
points.status: The terms of conditions states that any liability will not exceed the "aggregate dollar amount paid by the User claimant to TunnelBear in the twelve months prior to the claimed loss, damages or other such alleged event giving rise to the basis of claim".
points.quoteText: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in no event shall the total liability of TunnelBear, for all damages, losses and causes of action whether in contract, tort including negligence, or otherwise, exceed the aggregate dollar amount paid by the User claimant to TunnelBear in the twelve months prior to the claimed loss, damages or other such alleged event giving rise to the basis of claim.

points.title: TunnelBear's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
points.status: The privacy policy states that they "store your Personal Data only as long as is necessary for the purposes for which it is collected, to provide our Services, resolve disputes, establish legal defenses, conduct audits, pursue legitimate business purposes, enforce our agreements, and comply with applicable laws" and that they  "erase or destroy the records containing Personal Data when they are no longer required; this will be done in ways that will ensure your continued privacy".
points.quoteText:
We store your Personal Data only as long as is necessary for the purposes for which it is collected, to provide our Services, resolve disputes, establish legal defenses, conduct audits, pursue legitimate business purposes, enforce our agreements, and comply with applicable laws.
We erase or destroy the records containing Personal Data when they are no longer required.
this will be done in ways that will ensure your continued privacy.

points.title: TunnelBear gives no guarantee regarding quality
points.status: The terms of service state: "TunnelBear does not guarantee as to the continuous availability of the service or of any specific feature(s) of the service. […] TunnelBear makes no representation, warranty, or guarantee as to the reliability, timeliness, quality, suitability, availability, accuracy or completeness of the Services."
points.quoteText: TunnelBear makes no representation, warranty, or guarantee as to the reliability, timeliness, quality, suitability, availability, accuracy or completeness of the Services.

points.title: TunnelBear is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
points.status: The terms of service state that "The Service is provided by TunnelBear on and [sic] "as is" "as available" basis without warranties of any kind" and that "[y]ou expressly agree that use of the Services is at your sole risk."
points.quoteText:
The Service is provided by TunnelBear on and “as is” “as available” basis without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including without limitation, any implied warranty of metchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of third-party rights, are hereby disclaimed to the maximum extent permitted by law.
You expressly agree that use of the Services is at your sole risk.

points.title: Terms and privacy policy may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
points.status: Using TunnelBear after the privacy policy or terms have changed means that you have accepted them. TunnelBear will notify you if they have changed by posting an announcement on their website and you are responsible for reviewing the modifications.
points.quoteText:
TunnelBear Inc.
(“TunnelBear”) reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace the terms of this Agreement at any time.
If the alterations constitute a material change, TunnelBear will notify you by posting an announcement on the TunnelBear website.
What constitutes a material change will be determined at TunnelBear’s sole discretion.
You shall be responsible for reviewing and becoming familiar with any such modifications.
Using our Services following notification of a material change to this Agreement shall constitute your acceptance of the Agreement as modified.

points.title: TunnelBear uses third-party cookies for statistics
points.status: TunnelBear uses Google Analytics to "see how many people are visiting [their website]". They have set it to use the minimum available retention period and not store IP addresses.

To make our website better, we use Google Analytics (GA) to see how many people are visiting it.
We have set GA to use the minimum available retention period and not store IP addresses.

points.status: The privacy policy states that "TunnelBear does not store Personal Data outside of Canada's physical borders".
points.quoteText: Although our physical servers are located in many different countries around the world, TunnelBear does not store Personal Data outside of Canada's physical borders.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.status: Generated through the annotate view
points.quoteText: the use of the Services will be secure, timely, uninterrupted or error-free

points.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
points.status: TunnelBear defines "personal data" as "any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ("Individual") and includes information provided by you while using our Services". They also consider personal data combined with non-personal data to be personal data.  The privacy policy states that you can ask for them to correct, amend, or delete your personal data "where it is inaccurate". You can easily download, amend, or delete your personal data on https://www.tunnelbear.com/account/privacy.  A download of data can be emailed to you. You can update payment details and your email address yourself, but for all other data, you need to send an email to privacy@tunnelbear.com. Deleting all data involves deleting your account.
points.quoteText: You have the right to inquire as to whether TunnelBear is Processing Personal Data about you, request access to Personal Data, and ask that we correct, amend or delete your Personal Data where it is inaccurate.

points.title: TunnelBear makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.status: The terms of service state: "The speed and quality of the Service may vary and the Service is subject to unavailability, including emergencies, third party service failures, transmission, equipment or network problems or limitations, interference, signal strength, and maintenance and repair, and may be interrupted, refused, limited or curtailed. TunnelBear is not responsible for any failures to maintain the confidentiality, security, accuracy or quality of your data, messages or pages whether or not related to interruptions or performance issues with the Service. […] TunnelBear does not represent or warrant that (a) the use of the Services will be secure, timely, uninterrupted or error-free or operate in combination with any other hardware, software, system or data".
points.quoteText:
The speed and quality of the Service may vary and the Service is subject to unavailability, including emergencies, third party service failures, transmission, equipment or network problems or limitations, interference, signal strength, and maintenance and repair, and may be interrupted, refused, limited or curtailed.
TunnelBear is not responsible for any failures to maintain the confidentiality, security, accuracy or quality of your data, messages or pages whether or not related to interruptions or performance issues with the Service.

points.title: TunnelBear uses your information according to Canada's laws
points.status: TunnelBear uses your information according to Canada's laws, regardless of which country you are located in.
points.quoteText: By using our services, you authorize TunnelBear to use your information according to Canada's laws, regardless of which country you are located in.

points.title: TunnelBear assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.status: The terms of service state that "[i]n no event shall TunnelBear be liable under contract, tort, strict liability, negligence or any other legal theory with respect to the services for any lost profits or Special, indirect, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages of any kind whatsoever."
points.quoteText: In no event shall TunnelBear be liable under contract, tort, strict liability, negligence or any other legal theory with respect to the services for any lost profits or Special, indirect, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages of any kind whatsoever.

points.title: TunnelBear can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
points.status: The terms of service state that "TunnelBear […] may terminate or suspend your use of the Service at any time" and that it "may also […] discontinue the Services in their entirety […] with or without notice".
points.quoteText:
You agree that TunnelBear, in its sole discretion, for any or no reason, and without penalty, may terminate or suspend your use of the Service at any time.
TunnelBear may also in its sole discretion and at any time discontinue the Services in their entirety, or any part thereof, with or without notice.
